snippet: Two federal loan programs that include loan forgiveness can result in a huge tax bill years later when the remaining balance is forgiven.
abstract: Ron Lieber Your Money column warns that two federal loan programs that include loan forgiveness can result in a huge tax bill for borrowers years later when the remaining balance is forgiven.
lead_paragraph: Two federal loan programs that include loan forgiveness can result in a huge tax bill years later when the remaining balance is forgiven.

headline.print_headline: For Student Borrowers, Relief Now May Mean a Big Tax Bill Later
headline.seo: For Student Borrowers, a Tax Time Bomb
headline.main: For Student Borrowers, Relief Now May Mean a Big Tax Bill Later
